juding_criteria:
Based on the Key Requirement and the specific prompt, here are the concrete visual elements the final image must contain:

*   Illuminated left desk lamp
*   Unilluminated right desk lamp
*   Left black bedside cabinet with silver stud details
*   Partially visible right black bedside cabinet with silver stud details
*   Bed with white tufted headboard
*   Multiple grey and purple pillows on the bed
*   White and grey patterned bedspread
*   White tufted bench at the foot of the bed
*   Light-colored carpet
*   Sheer curtains on the left window
*   Beige wall
